overview:
Andrew Dark , CEO and senior business leader with a consistent track record in delivering significant business turnaround and growth.

His experience and knowledge in payments be they card holder present, mobile or web initiated is very rare particularly given his clear successes at terminal manufacturer Dione Ltd, internet and card holder present payment processor DataCash Group PLC and mobile messaging and payment specialist mBlox Inc.

Andrew’s experience in payments was derived from his twenty successful years in the supply or technology to retailers including Point of Sale and payment systems.

Having run both public and private companies, with a variety of manufacturing, software and service operations, typically with multi country/continent.
